name: KuniTure -Demo
description:
This is my first attempt at making a game with GameMaker, my budget is zero but still I tried to do the best I could in a couple of months and I finally have a demo, I invite you to try to get their opinions and improve in everything possible.

If you complete the demo you can find out a bit of the history of the game ... I assure you that is not what it seems at first glance.

Demo in Spanish and English

Music by Kubbi: https://kubbi.bandcamp.com/
